# serval_group (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Query by ID
data "serval_group" "example_group_by_id" {
  id = "id"
}

# Query by name (more intuitive)
data "serval_group" "example_group_by_name" {
  name = "IT Admins"
}
```

## Argument Reference

This data source supports the following arguments:

- `id` (Optional) The ID of the group. Either `id` or `name` must be specified.
- `name` (Optional) The name of the group. Either `id` or `name` must be specified.

## Attribute Reference

This data source exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

- `id` (String) The ID of the group.
- `name` (String) The name of the group.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp in RFC 3339 format.
- `deleted_at` (String) Timestamp in RFC 3339 format.
- `organization_id` (String) The ID of the organization the group belongs to.
- `user_ids` (List of String) The IDs of users in the group.
